AT045.name: Agricultural Communications
AT045.description: Communication in agriculture including public speaking, group discussion, business correspondence, technical reports and a review of grammar and mechanics.
AT045.restrictions: Open only to students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.

AT055.name: Agricultural Finance
AT055.description: Introduction to agricultural finance. Types of credit. Financial alternatives.
AT055.restrictions: Open only to students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.

AT071.name: Technical Mathematics
AT071.description: Basic arithmetic. Whole numbers, common fractions, decimals, percentage, ratio, and proportion. Basic algebraic concepts and solutions for practical geometric problems.
AT071.restrictions: Open to students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.

AT101.name: Spanish for the Agricultural Industry
AT101.description: Practical Spanish language and culture related to the agricultural industry.
AT101.restrictions: Open to agricultural technology students in the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources.

AT102.name: Turf and Landscape Analytical Practices
AT102.description: Analytical practices related to the turf and landscape industry.
AT102.restrictions: Open to agricultural technology students in the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources.

AT193.name: Agricultural Technology Clerkship
AT193.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
AT193.restrictions: Open to agricultural technology students in the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources.

AT202.name: Agricultural Regulation, Compliance and Safety
AT202.description: Regulation, laws, compliance and safety as it relates to Michigan’s agricultural sector. Michigan Occupational Safety and Health Administration safety standards, food safety, water protection, pesticide and fertilizer application and voluntary programs for agricultural producers. Preparation for the pesticide core exam.
AT202.restrictions: Open to agricultural technology students in the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources.

AT214.name: Leadership Development in Agriculture and Natural Resources Industries
AT214.description: Leadership development, styles and evaluation in the agriculture and natural resources industries.
AT214.restrictions: Open to agricultural technology students in the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources.

AT290.name: Independent Study in Agricultural Technology
AT290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
AT290.description: Supervised individual study on experimental, theoretical or applied topics related to agricultural science and technology.
AT290.restrictions: Open to freshmen or sophomores or agricultural technology students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.

AT291.name: Selected Topics in Agricultural Technology
AT291.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
AT291.description: Selected topics of current interest in agricultural science and technology.
AT291.restrictions: Open to freshmen or sophomores or agricultural technology students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.

AT293.name: Professional Internship in Agricultural Technology
AT293.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
AT293.description: Supervised professional experience in agencies, business and industry related to a student's major field of study.
AT293.restrictions: Open to freshmen or sophomores or agricultural technology students in the Institute of Agricultural Technology.
